tag_list: startup, strietzel, stritz-live, strietzel-co, entreprenuership, financing, technology
overview: Jonathan is a serial entrepreneur with a track record for creating and patenting various technologies. He has successfully started and sold companies in the Internet technology space. He is credited as one of the early inventors of “Ring-Tone” advertising on mobile phones and was a very early inventor and thinker in cloud computing/storage of media online. Jonathan holds various patents in these respective fields.
